module.name: DAHDi Config
module.changelog: *2.11.14* With help from [sr] Fixes #6244 and also fixes #6247 *2.11.11* Fix #6281, #6269. Work on BRI re #6244 *2.11.9* Protect End Users Configuration Files *2.11.8* Sangoma Support *2.11.7* Fixed modprobe overwrite issue and space after equals *2.11.6* Moshe skinin' *2.11.5* Remove mac extra atts...again *2.11.4* Finished modprobe additional custom entries and cleanup *2.11.3* Fix up restarting issues and General Settings additional Settings *2.11.2* Add to extended repo *2.11.1.8* Fixes #4409 *2.11.1.5* Fixes #4558, #4837, #5005, #5256 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4921 *2.9.0.0* #4914, #4915 *2.8.0.1* dependency set to 2.8 because of dahdi tables *2.8.0.0* adds hooks into extensions and trunks pages and other fixes and tweaks *0.1* initial commit
